summary: Defines a NeMo model class that encapsulates the end‑to‑end pipeline for translating natural‑language utterances into SPARQL queries. It sets up tokenizers, prepares the Text2Sparql dataset, configures a transformer‑based encoder‑decoder (e.g., BART), and implements training, validation, and test steps with metrics such as perplexity, leveraging PyTorch Lightning for orchestration.
business_intent: Enable applications to automatically generate SPARQL queries from user questions, facilitating natural‑language interfaces to knowledge graphs and improving data retrieval in conversational AI systems.
